Title: 39628 - # Ways the Internet Has Changed the Way We Manage Money
Direction: 675 words. Discuss 4-8 ways that the internet has changed the way we manage money. With budgeting apps on our phones, easy to use online accounting software, and online banking, there is hardly ever a need to physically visit a bank, write a check, or use cash. Through the internet, we can now manage and handle our money more easily and conveniently than ever before. You can link to the target URL in a section that discusses the ease, benefits, and convenience of online accounting for small to mid-size businesses. Your target audience is tech-minded and likes staying up to date on the latest tech news.
Anchor Text: online accounting software branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: online accounting software like Sage One
